main.name: Kin Analytics
main.description: Kin Analytics offers analytical consulting services for all types of companies, organizations, and enterprises around the world, helping them innovate, grow, and evolve. Companies that learn how to best generate and analyze their data will survive, while those which innovate in this practice will thrive.
main.history: Our story begins with a couple of guys who liked sports and computers. They always dreamed of some way to get ahead of time and determine what will happen before it happens, they investigated about the machie learning and developed a successfull algorithm to hit the correct scores based on past events. That is how Kin Analytics born.

resume.skillmessage: Our commit is make that the things sports for the well'being of your strategy

banking.field: Consulting for IFRS 9 / CECL for an end to end solution
banking.description: Our procedure is designed to review the services of financial institutions to ensure they are in compliance with laws and industry standards. An accounting specialist known as a bank auditor carries out the review. Bank or credit union audits can be internal audits or external audits.

Kin Analytics offers systems capable of handling the entire credit decisioning process for any financial institution, from the moment of loan request, through disbursement, and even post disbursement activities. We offer the complete package in terms of credit scoring solutions, including a Front Office tool and Credit Scoring Engine from our partner strategy Cregora.

sports.title: Software designed for evaluation
sports.description: We choose data of the players, and we proced analyzed these data to determine for each possession, the two five-man units on court, which unit was home (or away), which unit had possession of the ball, and the number of points scored

sports.strategy: Rival Analysis: Assessment and Preparation Studies
sports.title: Consultoring and experts
sports.description: We offer strategic management to discover the strengths and weaknesses of current and potential competitors. This analysis provides both an offensive and defensive strategic context to identify opportunities and threats.

sports.title: Technology to monitor players
sports.description: We provide performance monitoring in analytics, regularly verifying and tracking how well and how consistently your players are performing.
